chapter.title: Build options and performance
chapter.para: As skit is currently in an alpha-testing phase, a number of debug options enabled by default. These can have a significant impact on performance.

In particular the default skit build includes a memory tracking subsystem, which records each malloc call in a hash so that we can ensure that it is subsequently freed. This adds a significant overhead. To disable memory tracking, add --enable-mtrack=np to the configure when building skit.
